reviews.review: Если вам нехуй делать покупайте Portal 2

an absolutely astonishing looking game, which is amazing given it's from 2011. although there are only a handful of characters in the game, they more than make up for it in sheer personality and comedy. the gameplay is nothing to snbeeze at either, with creative level designs that tie in with the amazing graphics and tough but gratifying puzzles. if you havent already played it, do it now.
gadający ziemniak zostanie na zawsze w moim sercu.
this is one of the best games of all time and you should play it immediately
这游戏真是让我眼前一亮，非常有意思，很难想象是十年前的游戏。
Amazing game, even better than the first story-wize, charming characters, beautiful awesome ending. 10/10

i may be suffering extreme effects from the Emancipation Grill but this game was honestly one of the best experiences i've ever had with a game. rating is well deserved.

recommend SEVERELY. its 2 dollars for 2 more days.
great story, great riddles, great atmosphere and funny

I'll miss you too, GLaDOS or Caroline. I did try to murder you twice, and my parents might've abandoned me, but you were my only best friend. 
                          ~ Love, Mute Human

完结撒花了。
感觉关卡的内容相对较简单，画质不错。
最后GLADOS唱的那首《Want You Gone》，歌词里感觉出了GLADOS对Chell的不舍之情...

Perfect for making you feel like a fool for not seeing the answer right in front of you. 
14/10
Интересно и поугорать с друзьями можно
A Classic that stands the test of time
Just buy it. You will love it.
10/10 game it has a great story and great twists controls r perfect. but u have to play them in order
this game taught me to never trust british people
This…game…is…AMAZING! I really like the story of the game, and I absolutely LOVE Wheatley’s sense of humor and the plot twist at the end of Chapter 5. 5 stars; would seriously recommend.
Great puzzle game with lots of personality, great story, and fun challenge. Definitely a step up from the original Portal and definitely something you should try.

This game is phenomenal. I love it so much. But I hate it, too. I hate it to the ends of the earth. Why do I hate this game that I absolutely adore?

Because I am dumb. I am legitimately fucking stupid. It took seven other people in a discord call to help me beat this game. So if you're smart, get it and get it now. If you're dumb, get it, and get some ibuprofen with it. But do get it. It's fun.

Best game out there, no question.

11 / 10
this game is worth the buy
Wheatly is annoying everything else in the single player story is pretty cool
The portal series, Making people feel stupid since 2007!
great sequel, the cake is a lie!
Even if it is 2021, it remains one of the best games :)
the best game i ever played !!
Compelling story, I didn't need to play the first game to get what is going on.
Игра во много раз превосходит своего предсшественника, после 1-ой части обязательно стоит поиграть
un classique même si je préfére l'ambiance du premier
kk uma bosta vai toma no cu

特價買回來的好遊戲
小時候曾經在網上下載來玩,而且玩到滿後面的
到現在再玩一次,好好地重溫了童年的快樂
可惜的是沒甚麼朋友,而且口味也不一
看來破完主線就只能先放在一邊了
可能因為沒玩過1,對於2的劇情是似懂非懂
把那個傻傻的機械人趕出太空了還是感到通體舒暢
但最後一幕總是令我覺得那是另一場實驗的開始

got both portal 1 & 2 for like 4 bucks dude holy fuck these games sucked me in for the 2 days i played them back to back. portal 2 is just portal one but laced with crack or something everything is just 10000 times better and even then portal 1 is still amazing  very fun game only gripe is that a couple times i got stuck but i think thats because im just dumb lol
Muy original, divertido y no es muy largo. Normalmente está en oferta, sin embargo, aún sin ellas lo hacen una compra casi obligada.
Harika bir oyun partner ile çok eğlenceli oluyor....
a gun makes portal hole puzzle thing yes also there co op if have friend and if no friend you can find someone online
It managed to make me like puzzles. Never got frustrating, fun all the way through

i mean honestly what do i even say here, its portal 2. everyone already knows its an absolute masterpiece and if you havent played or heard of it before, get on that. this is genuinely probably one of my favorite games off all time so of course im gonna suck the game off but its deserved

tldr play the game loser >:(
For a game made in 2011 some of the scenes still look amazing and the game play can be a nice challenge some times.

Very good.
Edit: Just like Portal 1, Portal 2 has a very good ending.
11/10
